messages.message:
Hi team-
Is there an API endpoint, or a plan for one, to get all conversations users have with a chatbot - something beyond the conversations you can view in the analytics page when users explicitly provide feedback on a response?

If I'm managing a chatbot I want to be able to access all the conversations to track how users interact with the bot to identify the happy and unhappy paths for users so that the knowledge base can be updated appropriately to provide better support to end users.
Currently there is no plan to add this feature. Adding @margaret.tomaszczuk to help with the above request
